imdb.title: Valkyrie Drive: Mermaid
imdb.plot: A virgin girl named Mamori who arrives on an island must compete in battle using special powers only activated through her sexual activity with the other girls on the island.

episodes.title: Valkyrie Drive: Mermaid Specials: Secret, Please
episodes.plot: In order to unlock higher powers as an Arm, Mirei asks Mamori to try different things to bring her pleasure.

episodes.title: Valkyrie Drive: Mermaid Specials: We Gotta Stick Together
episodes.plot: During a soak in the bath, Charlotte thinks about who she will use in her next sexual misdeeds, looking back on her past conquests of other women.

episodes.title: Mermaid Valkyrie Drive Special: Too Lonely To Sleep
episodes.plot: Having just left the shower, Kasumi lies on her bed, half naked, looking back fondly on her time with Hibiki and their lovemaking.

episodes.title: The Actress in the Mirror
episodes.plot: Contemplating how she is forced to disguise herself, Akira stands naked, wishing she could be back in the arms of her lover as she tapes her breasts down and assumes the mantle of Governor, wearing a uniform that makes her appear as a man.

episodes.title: Believe In Me, Believe In You
episodes.plot: While they have sex, Lady J notices that Rain is more lively and motivated than usual, and after having sex, she finds out that it's because Rain saw how two of her peers, Mirei and Mamori, were close together.

episodes.title: Lonely Chaser
episodes.plot: While looking up a picture of Mirei, Momoka begins to relive old memories of how they had sex together, and muses on the concept of her being able to fondle her in the same way she did before, and later destroy her.

episodes.title: I'm Getting Deflowered
episodes.plot: Mamori Tokonome watches in astonishment as two girls show off their intimate relationship. Little did she know that she had to establish a similar relationship with another girl, Mirei Shikishima, in order to fight for her life.

episodes.title: The Wedding Aisle
episodes.plot: Mamori and Mirei defeat Saejima, but are taken into custody by Charlotte and Ange. Now Mamori must prepare for a mysterious ceremony known as the Wedding.

episodes.title: Zero Arm
episodes.plot: Mamori and Mirei escape from the clutches of Welter. They soon learn the nature of the militant female-only group, and also discover a small peaceful village that is free from its rule.

episodes.title: Gouverneur
episodes.plot: Charlotte, Kasumi, and the forces of Wärter move in to take Mirei into custody, but the mysterious duo known as Lady Lady intervene. An all-out fight is about to break loose, but is halted by yet another new participant.

episodes.title: Giant Girl, Little Heart
episodes.plot: Kasumi leave the castle to investigate a strange Extar reading in the forest. There, she finds Mamori, Mirei, and a truly, tremendously buxom girl.

episodes.title: No Money, No Life
episodes.plot: The Mermaid Festival is here! Meifeng must control the outcome of the Beauty Pageant to cash in on her illegal gambling scam, and she knows just the right person for shaking up the votes.

episodes.title: To Believe
episodes.plot: Akira secretly leaves the castle to go on a secret mission. He meets Torino, and decides to spend the night outside of the castle. Meanwhile, a hostage situation takes place nearby.

episodes.title: Valkyrie Effect
episodes.plot: Akira meets Lady Lady at their secret hideout, not to detain them, but to send them on a secret mission - to unearth the "secret of Mermaid", which could be the key to escaping the island.

episodes.title: Takeover
episodes.plot: A mysterious new transfer named Momoka arrives on Mermaid. She immediately begins to befriend Charlotte and undermine the political stability established by Akira.

episodes.title: Oppression
episodes.plot: With Akira removed from power, Charlotte names herself the new Gouvernour, and immediately begins ruling Mermaid with an iron fist. Momoka and the other mysterious intruders seem to be taking advantage of this for their own gains.

episodes.title: Soldier Arm
episodes.plot: Mirei faces Momoka, her former partner. Momoka reveals the events that lead to their separation, the hatred she has towards Mirei, and her overwhelming Soldier powers.

episodes.title: Valkyrie Drive
episodes.plot: Momoka unleashes an enormous Valkyrie Effect through Mamori, overpowering Mirei. Now that nobody on Mermaid is strong enough to oppose her now, Momoka reveals her true intentions.
